text: aur hamane to har ummat mein ek (na ek) rasool is baat ke lie zarur bheja ki logon khuda kee ibaadat karo aur buton (kee ibaadat) se bache raho garaz unamen se baaz kee to khuda ne hidaayat kee aur baaz ke (sar) par gumaraahee savaar ho gaee to zara tum log rue zameen par chal phir kar dekho to ki (paigambaraane khuda ke) jhuthalaane vaalon ko kya anjaam hua
